original_text:
So is he who goes in to his neighbor's wife;
    none who touches her will go unpunished.
korean_text: 남의 아내와 통간하는 자도 이와 같을 것이라 그를 만지는 자마다 벌을 면하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: So is he who goes in to his neighbor's wife
none who touches her will go unpunished.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀를 만지는 자는 벌을 받지 않을 자가 없다
